data.send1Text: Good to see you in this tournament, noble hunter!
Good to see you in this tournament, noble hunter!
data.send2Text: Be the winner you always wanted to be!
Be the winner you always wanted to be!
data.send1Text: Don’t forget - in each match you make bet with chips.
Don’t forget - in each match you make bet with chips.
data.send2Text: I like bets. They are like DEATH! Bets make all players equal.
I like bets. They are like DEATH! Bets make all players equal.
data.send1Text: Bets are growing during the tournament. And matches become more challenging and risky!
Bets are growing during the tournament. And matches become more challenging and risky!

textArray.text: Tell me more about the tournament rules

data.send1Text: 3 main things about tournaments: SoloQ, bets on your own victory and fair prizes due to your rating in their ladders.
3 main things about tournaments: SoloQ, bets on your own victory and fair prizes due to your rating in their ladders.
data.send2Text: You play only with gamers of your skill level! So bet smart and get bigger prizes than pros!
You play only with gamers of your skill level! So bet smart and get bigger prizes than pros!
data.send1Text: The more chips you have - the higher in the ladder you are - the bigger prize you get!

textArray.text: Got it! I want to play!

data.send1Text: You place a bet and then we look for a good company for you.
You place a bet and then we look for a good company for you.
data.send2Text: When we find a team for you - just accept the match. And rip your enemies apart!
When we find a team for you - just accept the match. And rip your enemies apart!
data.send1Text: You meet your noble teammates on this site and then go to the LoL client using the tournament code shown in the GameStars lobby.
You meet your noble teammates on this site and then go to the LoL client using the tournament code shown in the GameStars lobby.
data.send2Text: If you win - your bet is doubled, if you lose - your bet is taken away from your stack.
If you win - your bet is doubled, if you lose - your bet is taken away from your stack.
data.send1Text: Don’t worry! We’ve got you covered. Your first victory would be doubled, your first defeat - reduced by half.

textArray.text: How can I get extra chips?

data.send1Text: When you enter a tournament you receive 1000 chips to make your crusade easier.
When you enter a tournament you receive 1000 chips to make your crusade easier.
data.send2Text: 1000! I need a month to collect as many souls!
1000! I need a month to collect as many souls!
data.send1Text: Also you can buy additional chips during a tournament by pressing REBUY CHIPS button.
Also you can buy additional chips during a tournament by pressing REBUY CHIPS button.
data.send2Text: Some players do it to save themselves from defeat.

textArray.text: I want to read the tournament rules
